about_the_game:
Under the influence of the Cthulhu deity, waves of evil continue to surge, turning creatures into unruly beings through a curse. The choice is yours to rise up and resist. Choose your holy relics, and enhance your weapons. Unleash a hail of bullets on your enemies with your fully equipped arsenal! Can you survive in this endless wave of evil?

MaliceWave is a 2D pixel bullet hell game. Enemies respawn with each wave. You can enter the store to purchase weapons and items to power up.

Game Features

Diverse Weapons and Holy Relics: Choose from a variety of weapons and relics to aid in your survival.
Hundreds of Items and Weapons: With hundreds of items and weapons to choose from, including those inspired by the styles of Cthulhu, mechanics, and magic, you'll always have new strategies to try.

Add our discord for latest update!

https://discord.gg/GzgBKFQc7f

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
